title: Cheap TV deal: this Vizio 50-inch 4K TV gets a massive $380 price cut at Walmart
author: mackenzie-frazier
summary: Snag this Vizio 50-inch 4K smart TV on sale for just $420
article: Start the weekend off with this fantastic cheap TV deal that we've spotted at Walmart. You can get the Vizio V-Series 50-inch 4K TV on sale for just $419.99 (was $799). That's a massive $380 discount and a fantastic price for a feature-rich 4K smart TV.

This 50-inch set delivers bold, bright colors and sharp contrasts thanks to the 4K HD resolution and full array backlighting with Dolby Vision. The Vizio TV also has smart capabilities, so you can enjoy your favorite movies and TV shows from apps like Netflix, Hulu, Disney Plus, and more. You're also getting Apple AirPlay 2 and Chromecast built-in so you can stream content from your iPhone or Android device directly to your TV. As we mentioned above, this is a fantastic deal for a feature-packed 4K TV and the lowest price we've seen for this particular model. If you're interested in other sizes and prices, we've listed more of the best cheap TV deals from your favorite retailers just below.

You can see more of the best cheap TV deals and sales and the best OLED TV deals. You can also shop for more offers with our roundup of the best Memorial Day sales from retailers like Best Buy, Walmart, and Amazon.
